ValidationRule.description: Avoid quotes cases being closed when the Price and Price Status are blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( Count_of_Blanks_of_Price_and_PriceStatus__c>=1, ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Web'), RecordTypeId ='01230000000Zen4', ISPICKVAL(Status,'Done') ), true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill "Price" or "Price Status" on the related Case line items, before closing the case
